::DrillBit::

He opened a comm.
"Dark Mouse. Could you come meet me and the others? We want to get you
out of the base incase Hell Beast's and Megatron's troops come for you.
We could also use your computer skills. Before you come warn the others
at the base of possiblw attack."
He looked back to Apoc.
"Agreed."
